search.query: index=* EventChannel="Microsoft-Windows-Sysmon/Operational" event_id=1 | dedup hash_sha256 process_name | stats earliest(_time) as earliest latest(_time) as latest by hash_sha256 process_name host_fqdn | inputlookup append=t threathunting_new_hashes.csv | stats min(earliest) as earliest, max(latest) as latest by hash_sha256 process_name host_fqdn | outputlookup threathunting_new_hashes.csv | eval new_hash=if(earliest>=relative_time(now(), "-7d@d"), 1, 0) | where new_hash=1 | eval earliest = strftime(earliest, "%Y-%m-%d %H:%M") | eval latest = strftime(latest, "%Y-%m-%d %H:%M") | table hash_sha256 process_name host_fqdn latest
